class  Dune::FoamGridEntity< 0, dim, GridImp >
 Specialization for codim-0-entities, i.e., elements.This class embodies the topological parts of elements of the grid. It has an extended interface compared to the general entity class. For example, Entities of codimension 0 allow to visit all neighbors. More...
